cast.original_title: Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings
cast.overview: Shang-Chi must confront the past he thought he left behind when he is drawn into the web of the mysterious Ten Rings organization.
cast.title: Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings

details.biography: Chinese-Indonesian actor well-known for his portrayal of Shuji Ishii-Peters in the Hulu comedy series PEN15. He was also featured in the show Legendary Dudas and portrayed young Jin Kazama in the Tekken film franchise. He portrayed Prince Zuko in the Live action series Avatar: the last airbender.
details.name: Dallas Liu
